testcase.classname: An Employee can create a new Account
testcase.name: Description positive test
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici gmibank sayfasina gider.....................................passed And Kullanici insan simgesine tiklar.......................................passed And Kullanici sign in text'ine tiklar......................................passed And Kullanici gecerli username'i girer......................................passed And Kullanici gecerli Password'u girer......................................passed And Kullanici Sign in butonuna tiklar.......................................passed And Kullanici My Operations'a tiklar......................................passed And Kullanici Manage Accounts'a tiklar.....................................passed And Kullanici +Create a new Account'a tiklar..............................passed And Kullanici Description textboxuna Önemli musteri aciklamasini girer......passed Then Kullanici Description'in hata uyarisi vermedigini goruntuler..........passed

testcase.classname: An Employee can create a new Account
testcase.name: Description negative test
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici My Operations'a tiklar....................................passed And Kullanici Manage Accounts'a tiklar.....................................passed And Kullanici +Create a new Account'a tiklar..............................passed And Kullanici Description textboxunu bos bırakır............................passed Then Kullanici This field is required hata uyarisini goruntuler.............passed
